pr_title: CAM-12421: chore(engine): add telemetry request timeout configuration

timeline.message:
chore(engine): add telemetry request timeout configuration

* introduce a process engine configuration property
* default value 15 seconds
* apply the configuration on the telemetry request

Related to CAM-12421

timeline.bodyText: This is probably not needed anymore, right?
